characters.name: Luna
characters.description: A tactician with little patience, but calm attitude. Her thirst for knowledge drove her to the magic city of Juno, where the secrets of the world are stored.

appearance.title: Style
content: Horizontally braided hair, on the back
Soft, short, black and white dress, with golden outline
Soft, long, red and black cape, with golden outline

appearance.title: Gear
content: Magic amplifying crystals, throughout her clothes

characters.name: Rose
characters.description: A noble who wants to become the perfect hero. After her journey to Ash Vacuum, she currently seeks to bridge the gap between nobility and commoners.

traits.title: Goals
content: Lessen the gap between nobility and commoners
Become a hero worth of the history books

appearance.title: Gear
content: Silver armor, with golden, metallic pieces
Long, red cape, with golden details

characters.name: Lily
characters.description: A charismatic merchant, in love with life. Always being the reliable one, she now struggles to accept the decay of her strength, as magic overtakes physicality.

appearance.title: Style
content: White jacket-shorts mix, kept open. The top part hanging below the hips area

appearance.title: Gear
content: Yellow metal protectors on the limbs

characters.name: Mekina
characters.description: Vi, but less violent... I think.

characters.name: Ceffy
characters.description: ARE YOU A KID OR ARE YOU A SQUID?
